title: A Tale for the Time Being - Ruth Ozeki
description:

But before she ends it all, Nao plans to document the life of her great-grandmother, a Buddhist nun whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lived more than a century. A diary is NaoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only solaceÃ¢â‚¬â€and will touch lives in a ways she can scarcely imagine.

Across the Pacific, we meet Ruth, a novelist living on a remote island who discovers a collection of artifacts washed ashore in a Hello Kitty lunchboxÃ¢â‚¬â€possibly debris from the devastating 2011 tsunami. As the mystery of its contents unfolds, Ruth is pulled into the past, into NaoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s drama and her unknown fate, and forward into her own future.
 

Full of OzekiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s signature humour and deeply engaged with the relationship between writer and reader, past and present, fact and fiction, quantum physics, history, and myth, A Tale for the Time Being is a brilliantly inventive, beguiling story of our shared humanity and the search for home.
